Epilepsy-related gene expression¶

This page contains descriptions and examples to extract epilepsy-related gene expression data!

Epilepsy-related gene expression maps¶

Leveraging findings from a recent GWAS from the International League Against Epilepsy Consortium on Complex Epilepsies, we can extract gene expression maps for a set of pre-defined epilepsy-related genes!
